en.custom.max11char: Maximum 11 alphanumeric characters. Start with a letter
en.string.base64: {{#label}} must be a valid base64 string
en.string.dataUri: {{#label}} must be a valid dataUri string
en.string.domain: {{#label}} must contain a valid domain name
en.string.empty: {{#label}} is not allowed to be empty
en.string.hexAlign: {{#label}} hex decoded representation must be byte aligned
en.string.ip: {{#label}} must be a valid ip address with a {{#cidr}} CIDR
en.string.ipVersion: {{#label}} must be a valid ip address of one of the following versions {{#version}} with a {{#cidr}} CIDR
en.string.isoDuration: {{#label}} must be a valid ISO 8601 duration
en.string.max: {{#label}} length must be less than or equal to {{#limit}} characters long
en.string.min: {{#label}} length must be at least {{#limit}} characters long
en.string.normalize: {{#label}} must be unicode normalized in the {{#form}} form
en.string.token: {{#label}} must only contain alpha-numeric and underscore characters
en.string.pattern.base: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} fails to match the required pattern: {{#regex}}
en.string.pattern.name: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} fails to match the {{#name}} pattern
en.string.pattern.invert.base: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} matches the inverted pattern: {{#regex}}
en.string.pattern.invert.name: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} matches the inverted {{#name}} pattern
en.string.trim: {{#label}} must not have leading or trailing whitespace
en.string.uriCustomScheme: {{#label}} must be a valid uri with a scheme matching the {{#scheme}} pattern
en.string.uriRelativeOnly: {{#label}} must be a valid relative uri

es.array.length: {{#label}} debe ser una lista con {{#limit}} elementos
es.array.max: {{#label}} posee mas elementos de los permitidos (maximo {{#limit}}
es.array.min: {{#label}} posee menos elementos de los permitidos (minimo {{#limit}}
es.date.base: {{#label}} debe poseer un formato de fecha válido
es.date.max: {{#label}} no puede ser una fecha mayor a {{#limit}}
es.date.less: {{#label}} no puede ser una fecha menor a {{#limit}}
es.email.invalid: {{#label}} no posee un formato de correo válido
es.string.base64: {{#label}} debe ser un texto base 64 válido
es.string.domain: {{#label}} debe tener un nombre de dominio válido
es.string.empty: {{#label}} is not allowed to be empty
es.string.hex: {{#label}} solo debe contener caracteres hexadecimales válidos
es.string.hostname: {{#label}} debe ser un nombre de host válido
es.string.isoDate: {{#label}} debe ser un una fecha con formato iso válido
es.string.lowercase: {{#label}} solo puede contener caracteres en minúsculas
es.string.trim: {{#label}} no debe contener espacios al inicio ni al final
es.string.uppercase: {{#label}} solo puede contener caracteres en mayúsculas
